item.title: Automation Mindset - Technical Details
item.description: Foreword As a brief disclaimer, I want to make it clear that I do not consider myself an expert or advanced scripter, and that is completely acceptable. It is important to understand that not all code is perfect on the first attempt, and the code I will be discussing here is no exception. This was my first serious attempt at automating a task within a real enterprise environment, so the code is far from optimal.

item.title: Automation Mindset - A How To
item.description: Introduction Welcome! Welcome! Traveler, I see you’ve come to hear the tale of automation’s greatness. Excellent choice. Shall we begin? So… what is automation? I know, I know-you didn’t come here for a history lesson. Neither did I. But a little context helps, so don’t click away just yet. You hear me? Anyway, in today’s digital world, automation means using technology to handle repetitive tasks—automatically. Instead of manually sending emails, moving files, or copying data, software does it for you.
